WorkloadProfile.Description: Sets workload profile of the system

BootMode.Description: Sets boot mode of the system

ProcHyperthreading.Description: When enabled each physical processor core operates as two logical processor cores

EmbNicEnable.Description: Enables or disables HPE Ethernet 1GB 4-port 331i Adapter - NIC

EmbNicLinkSpeed.Description: Enables or disables link speed for HPE Ethernet 1GB 4-port 331i Adapter - NIC

EmbNicPCIeOptionROM.Description: Enables or disables option ROM for HPE Ethernet 1GB 4-port 331i Adapter - NIC

PciSlot1Enable.Description: Enables or disables HPE Ethernet 10Gb 2- port

PciSlot1LinkSpeed.Description: Enables or disables link speed for  HPE Ethernet 10Gb 2- port

PciSlot1OptionROM.Description: Enables or disables option ROM for  HPE Ethernet 10Gb 2- port

PciSlot2Enable.Description: Enables or disables HBA Mezzanine card

PciSlot2LinkSpeed.Description: Enables or disables link speed for HBA Mezzanine card

PciSlot2OptionROM.Description: Enables or disables option ROM for HBA Mezzanine card

PciSlot3Enable.Description: Enables or disables HBA Mezzanine card

PciSlot3LinkSpeed.Description: Enables or disables link speed for HBA Mezzanine card

PciSlot3OptionROM.Description: Enables or disables option ROM for HBA Mezzanine card

VirtualSerialPort.Description: Assigns the logical COM port address and associated default resources used by VSP

Slot1NicBoot1.Description: Enables or disables network boot for UEFI

Slot1NicBoot2.Description: Enables or disables network boot for UEFI

Slot1NicBoot3.Description: Enables or disables network boot for UEFI

ServerName.Description: Server name as displayed in the iLO and BIOS
